prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, Pipe, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Pipe are all featured in this song, but Brass is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Pipe, but no Brass.

Style 3:
No Brass is included in this song, which instead features Organ, Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Pipe.
